quest_intro.title: Remove the fallen tree
quest_intro.summary: It will be removed once Grace is 'found'.

quest_orc_guards.title: The guards of Ardor
quest_orc_guards.summary: You found out that Grace probably is where Ardor is. Two orc guards won't let you get to Ardor. Find a way to get past them.

1.taskPhrase: Retrieve the mask of Ardor from an orc

2.taskPhrase: Show the mask to the guards

quest_scared_orc.title: Find hidden door
quest_scared_orc.summary: The frightened orc said: Here inside cave, at complete other side, go all way to south, then east, search north wall, there is hidden door in dark.
